messages.subject: New Discovery
messages.msgSnippet: OK, get this-- Toshizou wasn t the only Hijikata in Tennen Rishin Ryuu, _or_ fighting on the Bakufu side. Turns out his nephew Yuutarou was one of the last
messages.messageBody:
OK, get this-- Toshizou wasn't the only Hijikata in Tennen Rishin Ryuu, _or_
fighting on the Bakufu side. Turns out his nephew Yuutarou was one of the
"last 1000 doshin" of the Bakufu. The site is
http://byp.web.infoseek.co.jp/yuutarou1.htm, and I'm trying to get through
it so I can translate as soon as I can-- it'll be a little difficult this
week, because my uncle's getting married this week, and his inlaws are
coming from (you guessed it) Japan. But hey, maybe that'll mean I can get
some help with translation! ^_^

--M.
